Package org.exist.xupdate

Class Summary
Append Implements an XUpate append statement.
Conditional  
Insert Implements an XUpdate insert-after or insert-before modification.
Modification Base class for all XUpdate modifications.
Remove Implements an XUpdate remove operation.
Rename Implements an XUpdate rename operation.
Replace Implements xupdate:replace, an extension to the XUpdate standard.
Update Implements the XUpdate update modification.
XUpdateProcessor Main class to pre-process an XUpdate request.
